title: 8.17 Zoe Mini Rework
body: * Hey, I’m very confused if the 8.17 Mini rework for {{champion:142}} is going to come out. I kind of hope it doesn’t because I think {{champion:142}} is fun as she is but it could be a good mini rework, all I need to know is this mini rework going to come out in the future or did they cancel it?

replies.body: Looks like it is about to come out...I like Zoe too and I also think she's fun to play the way she is. I just hope this new 'rework' doesn't make her any less interesting
